column4: Kanotix is another Debian distribution, not just a hardware detection scheme
Yeah, I used to be a Kanotix user. But couldn't you just take Kanotix's kernel, which is downloadable on their website, and then model ubuntu around it?
You would need to ask someone who is more involved in the development end of the Ubuntu system to know if it was possible or what the plan is for driver/kernel support.
Also as i understand, the developer of Kanotix, Jrg Schirottke wrote much of the hardware detection engine.
